en: Please put down your name in this book.
zh: 请在这本册子上写下你的名字。

en: There are many questionable points in this ledger.
zh: 这本账本里有很多疑点。

en: This deposit bears three percent interest.
zh: 这笔存款有百分之三的利息。

en: The author has a beautiful style.
zh: 这位作者的文笔很美。

en: Can you validate this parking ticket?
zh: 可以帮我消一下这张停车券吗？

en: Keep this insect alive.
zh: 别让这只虫子死了。

en: This order has just come in over the phone.
zh: 这个订单是刚才电话里下的。

en: These beams will not carry the weight of the roof.
zh: 这些大梁撑不住房顶的重量。

en: This used car is for sale.
zh: 这辆二手车要卖。

en: This used car is as good as new.
zh: 这辆二手车就跟新的一样。

en: The price of this used car is reasonable.
zh: 这辆二手车的价格挺合理的。

en: It's very stuffy in here.
zh: 这屋里太闷了。

en: Are any of these locations easy to get to by bus?
zh: 这些地方有坐公交车比较方便到的吗？

en: Are any of these within walking distance?
zh: 这些地方有走路能到的吗？

en: I would take this brown tie.
zh: 我要这条棕色的领带。

en: Will you put on this kimono?
zh: 能请你穿上这件和服吗？

en: How nice this cup is!
zh: 这个杯子真好看！

en: This tea smells good.
zh: 这茶闻着真香。

en: This pond doesn't run dry even in summer.
zh: 这池塘就算在夏天也不会干涸。

en: The pond abounds with carp.
zh: 池子里有很多鲤鱼。

en: There used to be a lot of frogs in this pond.
zh: 以前这池子里有很多青蛙。

en: This local newspaper is published once a week.
zh: 这份地方报纸每周出一期。

en: Quite a few people were killed on the cold wave that hit this area.
zh: 袭击这一地区的寒潮导致不少人丧命。

en: A cold wave hit this district.
zh: 寒潮袭击了这个地区。

en: This district forms a basin.
zh: 这个地区是个盆地。

en: This district is known for its beautiful scenery.
zh: 这个地方以风景优美而闻名。

en: The community will benefit from the new industry.
zh: 社区会从这个新产业中获益。

en: This area is rich in marine products.
zh: 这个地区盛产海产品。

en: Do you have any regional dishes?
zh: 你们这儿有什么特色菜吗？

en: The young women of this district are well known for their beauty.
zh: 这个地区的姑娘们是出了名的漂亮。

en: Typhoons are frequent in this region.
zh: 这一带经常刮台风。

en: We get a lot of snow here in winter.
zh: 我们这儿冬天雪很大。

en: At this point the sea narrows into a strait.
zh: 大海在这里变窄，形成了一个海峡。

en: From this point the climb became suddenly steep.
zh: 从这儿开始，山路一下子就变陡了。

en: Can you tell me where I am on this map?
zh: 能帮我在地图上指一下我现在的坐标吗？

en: You'll find this map very useful.
zh: 你会发现这张地图很有用。

en: A great many houses were damaged in the earthquake.
zh: 地震中有很多房子受损。

en: The sole equality on earth is death.
zh: 世界上唯一的平等就是死亡。

en: This part of the land belongs to my stepmother.
zh: 这块地是我继母的。

en: This area has been considerably built up of late.
zh: 最近这一带盖了好多房子。

en: There are few bookstores in this area.
zh: 这一带没几家书店。

en: We often come across Japanese tourists in this area.
zh: 我们经常在这一带碰到日本游客。

en: We can get three stations in this area.
zh: 在这一带能收到三个频道。

en: Every person in this community is like a cell in the immune system of a healthy human body.
zh: 这个社区的每一个人都像健康人体免疫系统里的一个细胞。

en: This has been designated a conservation area.
zh: 这里被划定为了保护区。

en: This district is notorious for air pollution.
zh: 这个地区的空气污染是出了名的严重。

en: The area is built up now.
zh: 这一带现在建筑林立。

en: There are many stores in this area.
zh: 这一带商店很多。

en: This area is devastated.
zh: 这一带被毁得很严重。

en: This area will continue to be rainy.
zh: 这一带接下来还会一直下雨。

en: Water is scarce in this area.
zh: 这地方挺缺水的。

en: This area is extremely isolated.
zh: 这地方特别偏僻。

en: This area was first settled by the Dutch more than two hundred years ago.
zh: 两百多年前，最早搬到这儿住的是荷兰人。

en: It is necessary to look more carefully into the demographic configuration of this region.
zh: 得好好研究一下这块儿的人口构成。

en: Detailed maps for this area have not been drawn.
zh: 这地方还没出过详细的地图。

en: Unemployment in this part of the country is virtually nonexistent.
zh: 国家这块地方几乎没人失业。

en: People living in this area are dying for want of water.
zh: 住这儿的人快被渴死了。

en: We must pay attention to the fact that no nation claimed sovereignty over this region.
zh: 咱们得注意一下，没哪个国家宣布过对这块地儿拥有主权。

en: The region has never been inhabited by people.
zh: 这地方以前从来没人住过。

en: This district is free from environmental pollution.
zh: 这地方没什么环境污染。

en: This district attracts well-off people.
zh: 这一带挺吸引有钱人的。

en: This area abounds in wild animals.
zh: 这地方野生动物特别多。

en: A forest fire broke out in this area.
zh: 这片林子着火了。

en: It is the educational system that needs to be reformed in this area.
zh: 这块儿最该改的是教育制度。

en: Stars can be seen at night in this area.
zh: 这儿晚上能看见星星。

en: Stars can be seen clearly in this area.
zh: 这儿看星星特别清楚。

en: Hunting is prohibited in this area.
zh: 这地方不让打猎。

en: Houses can't be built in this area.
zh: 这块儿不给盖房子。

en: Factory jobs are drying up in the local economy.
zh: 当地工厂的活儿越来越少了。

en: This news is important to us.
zh: 这消息对咱们挺重要的。

en: Please keep this news to yourself for a while.
zh: 这事儿你先别跟别人说。

en: This man is very, very old.
zh: 这个人年纪特别特别大了。

en: This man was charged with theft.
zh: 这人被指控偷东西。

en: This boy has a strong and healthy body.
zh: 这孩子身体挺结实的。

en: I'll answer for this man's honesty.
zh: 我敢担保，这人挺老实的。

en: These men are used to hard work.
zh: 这几个人干惯了苦力活。

en: This paragraph is vague.
zh: 这段意思不太明确。

en: From this point we go on to an even more detailed examination of the concept of repression.
zh: 接下来，我们要进一步详细探讨‘压抑’这个概念。

en: This heating system burns oil.
zh: 这套供暖设备是烧油的。

en: This group passes out information on such things as travel and health care, and encourages its members to vote on issues that affect this age group such as legislation regulating the insurance industry, medical care and housing.
zh: 这个组织会提供旅游和医疗保健方面的信息，还会鼓励成员去给影响这个年龄段的法律投票，比如保险、医疗和住房监管法。

en: This expedition will be expensive.
zh: 这趟远征得花不少钱。

en: Leave out this word.
zh: 把这个词删了吧。

en: I'll look up this word in the dictionary.
zh: 我去查下字典看这词啥意思。

en: Please look up this word in a dictionary.
zh: 麻烦查下字典看这词是什么意思。

en: Look up this word in the dictionary.
zh: 查下字典看这个词。

en: This word is difficult to pronounce.
zh: 这词发音挺难的。

en: What does that word mean?
zh: 那词是啥意思？

en: How do you pronounce this word?
zh: 这词怎么读？

en: This word is derived from Latin.
zh: 这词是从拉丁语演变过来的。

en: This word is derived from German.
zh: 这词是从德语过来的。

en: This word is not in common use.
zh: 这词儿现在不怎么用了。

en: Do you know how to pronounce this word?
zh: 你知道这词怎么念吗？

en: Do you know the meaning of this word?
zh: 你知道这词是啥意思不？

en: What is the meaning of this word?
zh: 这词是什么意思？

en: I don't know what this word means. I'll look it up in the dictionary.
zh: 我不知道这词啥意思，我去查查字典。

en: I don't understand this word.
zh: 这词我没看明白。

en: This word has two meanings.
zh: 这词儿有两个意思。

en: Can you tell me what this word means?
zh: 你能告诉我这词是啥意思吗？

en: These shelves cannot support so many books.
zh: 这些书架放不下这么多书。

en: Don't take out the books on this shelf.
zh: 别拿这层架子上的书。

en: The pickled radish needs a touch of salt.
zh: 这腌萝卜得再加点儿盐。

en: The light is completely blocked out by the big tree.
zh: 阳光全被那棵大树给挡住了。

en: What is all the fuss about?
zh: 到底在闹腾什么呀？

en: There is a fairly small number of students at this university.
zh: 这学校的学生挺少的。

en: When was this university founded?
zh: 这大学是什么时候建的？

en: This college was established in 1910.
zh: 这学校是1910年建成的。

en: Some students in this university don't even know how to talk to teachers.
zh: 这学校有些学生连怎么跟老师说话都不知道。

en: There are ten thousand students in this university.
zh: 这大学里有一万个学生。

en: Life at this college is nothing like I expected.
zh: 这儿的大学生活跟我预想的完全不一样。

en: This big gate is disproportionate to the small garden.
zh: 这么大个门配个小花园，太不协调了。

en: Let's see what's happening in this big country.
zh: 咱们看看这大国里都在发生些什么事。

en: This large type is easy on the eyes.
zh: 这种大字看着不费眼。

en: This large sofa would be out of place in a small room.
zh: 这么大的沙发放在小房间里太不搭了。

en: Look at this large map of America.
zh: 瞧瞧这张美国大地图。

en: Where do you put the garbage in this kitchen?
zh: 这厨房里垃圾扔哪儿啊？

en: Please don't place a vase on this stand.
zh: 请别往这架子上放花瓶。

en: With the token they could only go to the company shop and buy food or clothing from that shop.
zh: 拿着这种代币，他们只能去公司的商店买吃的或穿的。

en: This loan will carry very heavy interest.
zh: 这笔贷款利息高得吓人。

en: The oranges in this bag are rotten.
zh: 这袋子里的橙子都烂了。

en: This refill lasts half a year.
zh: 这个替芯能用半年。

en: This experience will always remain in my memory.
zh: 这段经历我会记一辈子的。

en: The population of this village had decreased.
zh: 这个村子的人变少了。

en: This village is free from air pollution.
zh: 这村子一点空气污染都没有。

en: There is no factory in this village.
zh: 这村子里一个工厂都没有。

en: There are many old men in this village.
zh: 这村子里老人挺多的。

en: There are fifty families in this village.
zh: 这村里有五十来户人家。

en: In this village, they lived a happy life.
zh: 他们在这个村子里过得挺幸福的。

en: The things in this village are cheaper than those in ours.
zh: 这村里的东西比咱们那儿的便宜。

en: All this damage is the result of the storm.
zh: 这些损坏全是因为那场暴风雨。

en: I hope you will be pleased with this present.
zh: 希望你能喜欢这件礼物。

en: I cannot accept this gift.
zh: 这礼物我不能收。

en: Along with this increase, there has been a change in the world's economic organization.
zh: 随着这种增长，世界经济结构也跟着变了。

en: This statue was erected ten years ago.
zh: 这座雕像是十年前立起来的。

en: This statue is as large as life.
zh: 这雕像跟真人一样大。

en: This noise is something which I refuse to put up with.
zh: 这种噪音我真受不了。

en: This noise should be put up with.
zh: 这噪音只能先忍着了。

en: I cannot put up with this noise.
zh: 我受不了这吵闹声。

en: This noise is annoying.
zh: 这动静真烦人。

en: What's this noise?
zh: 这啥响声啊？

en: I can't put up with this noise.
zh: 我受不了这噪音。

en: I can't tolerate this noise any longer.
zh: 这噪音我实在没法再忍了。

en: I can't stand this noise any longer.
zh: 这噪音我实在受不了了。

en: I can not bear this noise any more.
zh: 这吵闹声我真没法再忍了。

en: With this noise, I couldn't sleep a wink.
zh: 吵成这样，我一点儿都没睡着。

en: The noise is driving me crazy.
zh: 这噪音快把我逼疯了。

en: What is all this bother about?
zh: 这又是闹哪样啊？

en: This meadow abounds in frogs.
zh: 这片草地上到处都是青蛙。

en: This device made it possible to turn sea-water into fresh water easily.
zh: 靠这个设备，海水变淡水就容易多了。

en: These windows look to the south.
zh: 这些窗户是朝南的。

en: By whom was this window broken?
zh: 这窗户是谁给弄破的？

en: This window has been broken for a month.
zh: 这扇窗户都坏了一个月了。

en: This window won't fasten.
zh: 这扇窗户扣不上。

en: This window won't open.
zh: 这扇窗户打不开。

en: She is responsible for this broken window.
zh: 这扇窗户坏了得由她负责。

en: This window overlooks the whole city.
zh: 从这扇窗户能俯瞰整个城市。

en: This window won't open. See if you can get it to move.
zh: 这扇窗户打不开。看看你能不能把它弄动。

en: This vacuum cleaner makes a lot of noise.
zh: 这台吸尘器噪音特别大。

en: This magnificent cathedral dates back to the Middle Ages.
zh: 这座宏伟的大教堂可以追溯到中世纪。

en: This mouse was killed by my cat.
zh: 这只老鼠是我家猫弄死的。

en: I do not want to reject this claim.
zh: 我不想拒绝这个要求。

en: This organization relies entirely on voluntary donations.
zh: 这个组织完全靠自愿捐款维持。

en: This institution came into being after the war.
zh: 这个机构是战后成立的。

en: This organization cannot exist without you.
zh: 没有你，这个组织就没法存在。

en: Since in this organization they're all chiefs and no Indians, it's a wonder any decisions get made.
zh: 既然这个组织里人人都是领导，没一个干活的，居然还能做出决定，真是奇迹。

en: This organization lacks unity.
zh: 这个组织缺乏凝聚力。

en: If this organization is left as it is, it will soon go bankrupt; its recovery is as difficult as swapping horses while crossing a stream.
zh: 如果这个组织照现状维持下去，很快就会破产；想让它恢复就像在过河时换马一样难。

en: Generally speaking, the students of this class are very good.
zh: 总的来说，这个班的学生都很优秀。

en: This material never wears out.
zh: 这种材料永远穿不烂。

en: The last volume is missing from this set.
zh: 这套书缺了最后一册。

en: The fifth volume of this set is missing.
zh: 这套书缺了第五册。

en: It's been two years since I saw him last.
zh: 我有两年没见到他了。

en: The last time I went to China, I visited Shanghai.
zh: 上次去中国的时候，我去了趟上海。

en: There is nothing new transpired since I wrote you last.
zh: 自从我上次给你写信后，没发生什么新情况。

en: At the last office I went to I ran out of work after a couple of hours, which made the rest of the day rather boring.
zh: 在我去的上个办公室，干了两个小时就没活儿了，让剩下的一天挺无聊的。

en: It's been five years since I last saw you.
zh: 我有五年没见到你了。

en: When did you visit Kyoto last?
zh: 你上次去京都是什么时候？

en: How long has it been since we last met?
zh: 咱们多久没见了？

en: It is a long time since I saw you last.
zh: 好久没见到你了。

en: She looked well when I last saw her.
zh: 上次见她时，她看起来气色不错。

en: Don't let me down as you did the other day.
zh: 别像那天那样让我失望了。

en: Start reading where you left off.
zh: 从你上次停下的地方接着读。

en: Where did we leave off last time?
zh: 我们上次讲到哪儿了？

en: Several houses were damaged in the last storm.
zh: 在上次那场暴风雨中，好几间房子都被毁坏了。

en: I haven't seen him since last Sunday.
zh: 从上周日以来我就一直没见过他。

en: That girl couldn't take things down in longhand, let alone shorthand.
zh: 那个女孩连普通手写都记不下来，更不用说速记了。

en: I spent last Sunday reading novels.
zh: 上个星期天，我一直都在看小说。

en: It happened that I was free last Sunday.
zh: 碰巧我上周日有空。

en: I remember riding home on a pickup truck last Sunday.
zh: 我记得上周日是坐一辆皮卡车回家的。

en: Last Sunday, Mary and I went to the library together.
zh: 上个星期天，玛丽和我一起去了图书馆。

en: Mother bought me a nice dress last Sunday.
zh: 上周日妈妈给我买了一件漂亮的连衣裙。

en: I went skiing at Zao last winter.
zh: 去年冬天我去了藏王滑雪。

en: I went skiing in Canada last winter.
zh: 去年冬天我去了加拿大滑雪。

en: Did you go to the last class?
zh: 你上节课去了吗？

en: What was the idea of leaving the cup upside down last time?
zh: 上次把杯子倒扣着放是什么意思？

en: How were your last exams?
zh: 你上次考试考得怎么样？

en: On my last visit to Kyoto I enjoyed myself very much.
zh: 我上次去京都玩得非常开心。

en: The pond dried up last summer.
zh: 去年夏天那个池塘干枯了。

en: Last summer, I finally left the firm that I had joined twelve years before.
zh: 去年夏天，我终于离开了那家我已经待了十二年的公司。

en: Last summer I had a chance to visit London.
zh: 去年夏天我有机会去了趟伦敦。

en: The last time I called him, he was out.
zh: 我上次给他打电话时，他不在家。

en: Their food was great last time.
zh: 上次他们家的菜挺好吃的。

en: I found that she wore the same dress that I had seen her wear last time.
zh: 我发现她穿的那条裙子跟我上次见她穿的是同一件。

en: The last time I saw Kent, he was very well.
zh: 我上次见 Kent 的时候，他挺好的。

en: You seem to have made considerable progress since I saw you last.
zh: 感觉自从我上次见你以来，你进步挺大的。

en: Do you remember when I saw you last?
zh: 你还记得我上次是什么时候见你的吗？

en: The other day I ran out of gas in the middle of a busy Interstate.
zh: 前几天我在一条车流很多的州际公路上开着开着没油了。

en: I name this ship the Queen Elizabeth.
zh: 我给这艘船起名叫“伊丽莎白女王号”。

en: This ship is driven by steam.
zh: 这艘船是蒸汽动力的。

en: This ship is too big to pass through the canal.
zh: 这条船太大，过不去运河。

en: This ship is not fit for an ocean voyage.
zh: 这艘船不适合远洋航行。

en: This ship is bound for Vancouver.
zh: 这艘船是开往温哥华的。

en: This boat goes through the jungle.
zh: 这条船穿过丛林。

en: This boat sails through the Strait of Gibraltar.
zh: 这艘船航行经过直布罗陀海峡。

en: What's the destination of this ship?
zh: 这艘船的终点站是哪儿？

en: The length of this ship is 30 meters.
zh: 这艘船有30米长。

en: Divide this line into twenty equal parts.
zh: 把这条线平分成二十段。

en: This line represents the longitude.
zh: 这条线代表经度。

en: This line is parallel to the other.
zh: 这条线和另一条是平行的。

en: This line is parallel to that.
zh: 这条线和那条是平行的。

en: Where is the end of this line?
zh: 这条线的终点在哪儿？

en: This line marks your height.
zh: 这条线标的是你的身高。

en: This diver's watch is a little too expensive.
zh: 这款潜水表有点太贵了。

en: This stain won't come out.
zh: 这个污渍洗不掉。

en: You can't use this washing machine.
zh: 这台洗衣机不能用。

en: Something is wrong with this washing machine.
zh: 这台洗衣机出故障了。

en: This stopper does not fit the bottle.
zh: 这个塞子和瓶口不匹配。

en: Could you tell me how to use this washing machine?
zh: 能教教我这台洗衣机怎么用吗？

en: This battle left Napoleon master of Europe.
zh: 这场战役让拿破仑成了欧洲的主宰。

en: This river is dangerous to swim in.
zh: 在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: Can you swim across this river?
zh: 你能游过这条河吗？

en: This river is beautiful.
zh: 这条河真漂亮。

en: This river flows south into the sea.
zh: 这条河向南流进大海。

en: This river is going to overflow.
zh: 这条河水快漫出来了。

en: This river rises in the mountains in Nagano.
zh: 这条河发源于长野县的山区。

en: This river is 500 miles in length.
zh: 这条河有500英里长。

en: This river sometimes overflows after the thaw.
zh: 解冻后这条河有时会漫出来。

en: This river extends for hundreds of miles.
zh: 这条河延伸了好几百英里。

en: This river is about one third as long as the Shinano.
zh: 这条河大约只有信浓川的三分之一长。

en: This river runs through my village.
zh: 这条河穿过我们村。

en: This river is dangerous for children to swim in.
zh: 小孩在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: This river is polluted with factory waste.
zh: 这条河被工厂废水污染了。

en: What is the name of this river?
zh: 这条河叫什么名字？

en: This river is not polluted.
zh: 这条河没有被污染。

en: This river is deep enough to swim in.
zh: 这条河够深，可以游泳。

en: The river flows too fast to swim in.
zh: 那条河水流得太急，没法游泳。

en: This river is very dangerous to swim in.
zh: 在这条河里游泳非常危险。

en: This river flows too fast to swim in.
zh: 这条河水流得太快，没法游泳。

en: This river is dangerous to swim across.
zh: 游过这条河很危险。

en: This river is safe to swim in.
zh: 在这条河里游泳很安全。

en: The river is the widest in Europe.
zh: 这条河是欧洲最宽的。

en: This river is deepest here.
zh: 这条河这儿最深。

en: This river runs into Lake Ontario.
zh: 这条河流入安大略湖。

en: This river is three times longer than that one.
zh: 这条河是那条河的三倍长。

en: This river becomes shallow at that point.
zh: 这条河在那儿变浅了。

en: This river is dangerous to swim in, in July.
zh: 七月份在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: The current of this river is rapid.
zh: 这条河水流很急。

en: How wide is this river?
zh: 这条河有多宽？

en: This river is one mile across.
zh: 这条河有一英里宽。

en: The water in this river is very clean.
zh: 这条河里的水很干净。

en: This river is so polluted that fish can no longer live in it.
zh: 这条河污染太严重了，鱼都没法活了。

en: There is a bridge about one kilometer up this river.
zh: 往上游走大约一公里有一座桥。

en: That bridge across this river is the oldest in the town.
zh: 跨过这条河的那座桥是镇上最老的。

en: This river abounds in small fish.
zh: 这条河里有很多小鱼。

en: This river abounds in trout.
zh: 这条河里有很多鳟鱼。

en: The fish caught in this river are all nice.
zh: 这条河里钓到的鱼都挺好的。

en: The number of fish caught in this river was very small.
zh: 这条河里没钓到几条鱼。

en: It's dangerous to swim in this river.
zh: 在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: Is it safe to swim in this river?
zh: 在这条河里游泳安全吗？

en: Swimming is not allowed in this river.
zh: 这条河不让游泳。

en: This technical journal is above me.
zh: 这本技术期刊我看不懂。

en: Can you break this thousand-yen bill?
zh: 能帮我把这张一千日元换成零钱吗？

en: This heirloom shall be yours.
zh: 这件传家宝归你了。

en: This teacher goes by the name of "Pops."
zh: 这个老师的外号叫“老爹”。

en: Danger ahead.
zh: 前方危险。

en: None of us knows what is in store for us.
zh: 谁都不知道未来会发生什么。

en: I can't write with this dull pencil.
zh: 这支铅笔秃了，没法写字。

en: The road ahead is frozen.
zh: 前面的路结冰了。

en: What will come?
zh: 接下来会发生什么？

en: You are mad to go out in the snow without a coat.
zh: 这么大雪不穿大衣出去，你疯了吧。

en: The trains are running in this snow.
zh: 这么大的雪，火车居然还在跑。

en: Take this folding umbrella with you. It might come in handy.
zh: 带上这把折叠伞吧，也许能派上用场。

en: Can I cancel this ticket?
zh: 这张票能退吗？

en: You may give this ticket to whoever wants it.
zh: 谁想要这张票你就给谁吧。

en: This is a free ticket.
zh: 这是张免费票。

en: This ticket allows you to stop over at any station.
zh: 凭这张票可以在任何一站中途下车。

en: This ticket is good for three days.
zh: 这张票三天内有效。

en: This ticket holds good only for two days after purchase.
zh: 这张票买完后两天内有效。

en: This ticket holds good for a month.
zh: 这张票的有效期是一个月。

en: This ticket is good for one more week.
zh: 这张票还能再用一个星期。

en: Could you change the departure date for this ticket?
zh: 这张票的出发日期能改吗？

en: The ticket admits two persons.
zh: 这张票可以进两个人。

en: Can I see the special exhibit with this ticket?
zh: 用这张票能看特展吗？

en: This ticket will admit two persons free.
zh: 这张票可以免费进两个人。

en: This ticket admits two persons.
zh: 一张票可以进两个人。

en: I'll give you either of these stamps.
zh: 这两张邮票你随便挑一张吧。

en: Whose image is on this stamp?
zh: 邮票上的头像是谁？

en: The red kills the whole pattern.
zh: 红色把整个图案都毁了。

en: The baby cannot use a spoon yet.
zh: 这孩子还不会用勺子。

en: Is this baby a he or a she?
zh: 这孩子是男孩还是女孩？

en: This baby is 3 weeks old.
zh: 这宝宝才三周大。

en: This red hat corresponds well to her dress.
zh: 这顶红帽子和她的裙子挺搭的。

en: How much for this red hat?
zh: 这顶红帽子多少钱？

en: You have only to push this red button.
zh: 你只要按这个红按钮就行了。

en: Who is ultimately responsible for this?
zh: 这事儿最后到底归谁管？

en: This soap will improve her complexion.
zh: 这块肥皂能让她的皮肤变好。

en: Help me move this stone.
zh: 帮我搬一下这块石头。

en: Can you lift this stone?
zh: 你能搬动这块石头吗？

en: This stone is too heavy to lift.
zh: 这块石头太重了，搬不动。

en: This stone is too heavy for me to move.
zh: 这块石头太重，我搬不走。

en: This stone was so heavy that I could not lift it.
zh: 这石头太沉了，我根本搬不起来。

en: This stone is twice as heavy as that one.
zh: 这块石头比那块重一倍。

en: This stone weighs five tons.
zh: 这块石头有五吨重。

en: This stone has a hole in the center.
zh: 这块石头中间有个洞。

en: Will you keep this seat for me?
zh: 能帮我占个座吗？

en: Will you hold this seat for me?
zh: 能帮我留着这个位子吗？

en: Can you save this seat for me?
zh: 能帮我占一下这个座吗？

en: Could you take me to this seat?
zh: 能带我去这个座位吗？

en: Is this seat taken?
zh: 这儿有人吗？

en: I hope this seat is not occupied.
zh: 我希望这个位子没人。

en: Where's this seat?
zh: 这个座儿在哪儿？

en: Is this seat empty?
zh: 这个位子是空的吗？

en: I can't see the stage well from this seat.
zh: 坐这儿看不清台子。

en: I'm about tired of this quiet life.
zh: 这种安静的生活我快过腻了。

en: Hunting game is forbidden in these tranquil woods.
zh: 这片安静的林子里禁止打猎。

en: Hunting game is forbidden in this tranquil wilderness.
zh: 这片寂静的荒野禁止打猎。

en: This blue sweater is very pretty.
zh: 这件蓝毛衣挺好看的。

en: The payment of this bill is due today.
zh: 这单今天该交钱了。

en: This work is beautifully finished.
zh: 这活儿干得真漂亮。

en: These products are selling like hot cakes.
zh: 这些产品卖得火极了。

en: This product is made in Italy.
zh: 这东西是意大利产的。

en: These products are superior to theirs.
zh: 这些产品比他们的强。

en: This product brought us a large margin.
zh: 这个产品给我们带来了挺高的利润。

en: Please order this product by February 15, and we will be able to deliver it before March 15.
zh: 请在2月15号前订货，这样我们在3月15号前就能发货。

en: This material is not suitable for a dress.
zh: 这种料子不适合做裙子。

en: Each of these students has his or her own opinion.
zh: 这些学生每个都有自己的想法。

en: This material stretches easily.
zh: 这种料子弹性挺大的。

en: This fabric stains easily.
zh: 这种布料容易弄脏。

en: This cloth is superior to that.
zh: 这块布比那块好。

en: This cloth irons well.
zh: 这块布挺好熨的。

en: I want a suit made of this material.
zh: 我想用这种料子做套西装。

en: I'm going to make this material into a skirt.
zh: 我打算用这块料子做条裙子。

en: I want to buy this material for a new dress. How much does it cost?
zh: 我想买这块料子做件新裙子，怎么卖？

en: I'm tired of living this life.
zh: 这种生活我过腻了。

en: I hope this fine weather lasts till the weekend.
zh: 希望这好天气能持续到周末。

en: This government is really putting the clock back.
zh: 这届政府真是在开历史倒车。

en: This political problem gave rise to hot discussions.
zh: 这个政治问题引起了激烈的讨论。

en: This policy is sure to go a long way towards stimulating business.
zh: 这项政策肯定能大大刺激商业发展。

en: Prices rose drastically as a result of this policy.
zh: 因为这项政策，物价飞涨。

en: This system will work well in nine cases out of ten.
zh: 这套系统十有八九没问题。

en: This system is bristling with defects and drawbacks.
zh: 这套系统漏洞百出，毛病挺多。

en: There is no room for further improvement in this system.
zh: 这个系统已经没法再改进了。

en: We ought to look the world straight in the face.
zh: 我们应该直面这个世界。

en: Welcome to this world!
zh: 欢迎来到这个世界！

en: When did the world come into being?
zh: 世界是什么时候形成的？

en: If only there were no wars in the world.
zh: 要是世界上没有战争就好了。

en: This world is but canvas to our imaginations.
zh: 这个世界不过是我们想象力的画布。

en: This world is but a place of passage.
zh: 这个世界只是一个落脚点。

en: There is nothing new under the sun.
zh: 太阳底下没有新鲜事。

en: Forget the anxieties of life and learn to relax.
zh: 忘掉生活中的烦心事，学会放松。

en: The joys of the world do but little.
zh: 世间的享乐其实微不足道。

en: We cannot know everything in the world.
zh: 我们不可能了解世间的一切。

en: Can you imagine a time when the world is free of war?
zh: 你能想象一个没有战争的世界吗？

en: There is nothing in this world that I am afraid of.
zh: 这世界上我没什么好怕的。

en: The day will come when I cease to be on this earth.
zh: 总有一天我会离开这个世界。

en: I don't have a care in the world.
zh: 我现在无忧无虑，什么也不愁。

en: There's only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it.
zh: 世界上只有一个最漂亮的孩子，每个母亲都觉得自己拥有他。

en: What would the world do without tea?
zh: 要是这世界没有茶，可怎么办呢？

en: Everybody in this world has to cope with a lot of difficulties.
zh: 每个人在这个世界上都得面对各种各样的困难。

en: The best thing in the world for a man is to choose a good wife, the worst being to mistakenly choose an ill-suited one.
zh: 对男人来说，世上最好的事莫过于娶到贤妻，最糟的就是娶错了人。

en: I find the great thing in this world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
zh: 我觉得这世上最重要的不是我们站在哪里，而是我们正朝着什么方向前进。

en: There is nothing on earth that is not affected by the sun.
zh: 地球上没有一样东西是不受太阳影响的。

en: There is nothing in the world from which we can't learn something.
zh: 世界上没有什么东西是不能让我们学到知识的。

en: Nothing is as terrible as losing someone you love in the world.
zh: 世界上没有什么比失去爱人更痛苦的了。

en: We don't know when this world came into being.
zh: 我们不知道这个世界是什么时候形成的。

en: The only thing in the world which one can never receive or give too much is love.
zh: 世界上唯独爱这种东西，是给多少、得多少都不嫌多的。

en: During these years he wrote immortal poems.
zh: 在这些年里，他写下了许多不朽的诗篇。

en: This figure is a mirror of the decrease in imports of crude oil.
zh: 这个数字反映了原油进口量的减少。

en: Add up this column of figures.
zh: 把这一列数字加起来。

en: This essay is about a piece of luggage.
zh: 这篇文章是写一件行李的。

en: This swimming suit is made of elastic material.
zh: 这件泳衣是用弹性材料做的。

en: It is good to drink this water.
zh: 喝这种水有好处。

en: This water contains a little alcohol.
zh: 这水里有一点酒精。

en: This water is a little salty.
zh: 这水有点咸。

en: This water is sterilized.
zh: 这水是经过消毒的。

en: This water has an ugly smell.
zh: 这水闻起来有股怪味。

en: This water is good to drink.
zh: 这水挺好喝的。

en: This water is safe to drink.
zh: 这水喝起来很安全。

en: This water tastes good.
zh: 这水味道不错。

en: I am halfway through this detective story.
zh: 这本侦探小说我读了一半了。

en: There are a great many books in this library.
zh: 这个图书馆里的藏书非常多。

en: This library has a large collection of Chinese books.
zh: 这个图书馆收藏了很多中文书。

en: There are a lot of English books in this library.
zh: 这个图书馆里有很多英文书。

en: Are there any English magazines in this library?
zh: 这个图书馆有英文杂志吗？

en: This library has over 50,000 volumes.
zh: 这个图书馆有五万多册藏书。

en: At this library, you can borrow up to three books at a time.
zh: 在这个图书馆，一次最多可以借三本书。

en: The illustration shows the deep interior.
zh: 插图展示了其深层内部。

en: This chart illustrates the function of ozone layer.
zh: 这张图表展示了臭氧层的功能。

en: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
zh: 这张图能解释我的意思。

en: These children are born not of natural descent, nor of human decision or a husband's will, but born of God.
zh: 这些孩子不是由血缘、人的决定或丈夫的意愿生的，而是由上帝所生的。

en: Did you make this doll by yourself?
zh: 这个洋娃娃是你自己做的吗？

en: This crowd reminds me of the streets of Tokyo.
zh: 这人挤得让我想起了东京的街头。

en: This doll belongs to me.
zh: 这个娃娃是我的。

en: This figure is supposed to represent Marilyn Monroe, but I don't think it does her justice.
zh: 这个人偶本来应该是玛丽莲·梦露，但我觉得没把她的韵味做出来。

en: This doll costs only sixty cents.
zh: 这个娃娃只要六毛钱。

en: This doll is a gift from my aunt.
zh: 这个娃娃是我阿姨送的。

en: This man has been blind for five years at least.
zh: 这个人失明至少有五年了。

en: I'd like to buy this doll.
zh: 我想买下这个娃娃。

en: He came as a witness to testify concerning that light.
zh: 他是作为证人来为那道光作证的。

en: This fellow is an artist!
zh: 这家伙是个艺术家！

en: This is the man who they say stole the car.
zh: 这就是大家说的那个偷车的人。

en: These people are anything but innocent.
zh: 这些人一点都不无辜。

en: This is John and that is his brother.
zh: 这是约翰，那是他哥哥。

en: Is this the girl you spoke well of the other day?
zh: 这就是你前几天夸过的那个女孩吗？

en: This man's shouting at me!
zh: 这个人在对我大喊大叫！

en: This gesture is familiar to young people.
zh: 年轻人都很熟悉这个手势。

en: Has anybody solved this mystery?
zh: 有人解开这个谜团了吗？

en: Destroy this temple.
zh: 拆掉这座圣殿。

en: It has taken forty-six years to build this temple.
zh: 建这座圣殿花了四十六年。

en: These pearls look real.
zh: 这些珍珠看起来像真的。

en: Give me these 8 crimson apples please.
zh: 请给我这八个深红色的苹果。

en: Fill in this application form and send it at once.
zh: 填好这张申请表，然后马上寄出去。

en: Please fill in this application form.
zh: 请填写这张申请表。

en: This offer does not meet our requirement.
zh: 这个报价不符合我们的要求。

en: There is a dense growth of vines in this forest.
zh: 这片森林里长满了茂密的藤蔓。

en: There are many birds in this forest.
zh: 这片森林里有很多鸟。

en: It is believed that ghosts exist in this forest.
zh: 据说这片森林里有鬼。

en: You can see some wild rabbits in the forest.
zh: 在森林里你能看到一些野兔。

en: You can see many animals in this forest.
zh: 在这片森林里你可以看到很多动物。

en: This new medicine has a lasting effect.
zh: 这种新药药效持久。

en: This new medicine may aid your recovery.
zh: 这种新药可能对你的康复有帮助。

en: The newspaper began to lose readers when it dispensed with one of its most popular writers.
zh: 那份报纸辞退了一位最受欢迎的作家后，读者就开始减少了。

en: This paper has a large circulation.
zh: 这份报纸发行量很大。

en: If you will not be available at the new time, please let us know.
zh: 如果新时间你没空的话，请告诉我们一声。

en: We can offer these new products at 20% below list price.
zh: 我们可以按标价的八折提供这些新品。

en: This new singer is really great.
zh: 这个新歌手真的很棒。

en: This new announcer keeps stumbling.
zh: 这个新播音员老是吃螺丝。

en: This new car will put other cars to shame.
zh: 这款新车会让其他车都黯然失色。

en: This new model of car is so popular.
zh: 这款新车型非常受欢迎。

en: This modern machine dispenses with much hard labor.
zh: 这种现代机器省去了很多繁重的体力劳动。

en: This new model of car is so popular that they have had to open a new factory to meet the demand.
zh: 这款新车型太受欢迎了，他们不得不新开一家工厂来满足需求。

en: This new investment will multiply our profit.
zh: 这项新投资会让我们的利润成倍增长。

en: This new soft drink is the best thing to drink this summer.
zh: 这种新出的软饮是今年夏天解暑的最佳选择。

en: It is hoped that this new policy will create jobs on a large scale.
zh: 希望这项新政策能大规模地创造就业机会。

en: You will save time if you adopt this new procedure.
zh: 如果采用这种新流程，你会省下不少时间。

en: A feature of this new car is that if a drunk person is driving, the engine won't start.
zh: 这款新车的一个特点是，如果司机喝醉了，发动机就发动不起来。

en: Is this new model available on the market?
zh: 这款新型号上市了吗？

en: I am uncomfortable in these new shoes.
zh: 穿这双新鞋我不舒服。

en: The new shoes pinch my feet.
zh: 这双新鞋挤脚。

en: I'd like to try out this new model before I buy it.
zh: 买之前我想先试用一下这个新型号。

en: I'm getting the hang of this new machine.
zh: 我正慢慢上手这台新机器。

en: With these new boots of mine, I hope to knock them dead.
zh: 穿上我这双新靴子，肯定能惊艳全场。

en: This new bus service will meet the residents' needs.
zh: 这个新公交服务能满足居民的需求。

en: This new necktie goes well with the suit.
zh: 这条新领带跟这套西装挺搭的。

en: What do you think of my new coat?
zh: 你觉得我这件新大衣怎么样？

en: These new curtains don't go well with the rugs.
zh: 这些新窗帘跟地毯不太搭。

en: This food is unhealthy.
zh: 这吃的太不健康了。

en: This food will keep for a week in an airtight container.

zh: 我骑这辆车的时候出了场严重的事故。

en: If in this self-portrait I seem to be staring at you, I'm not.
zh: 如果这张自画像里我看起来在盯着你，其实我没有。

en: The magnetite is attracted to the earth's magnetic field.
zh: 磁铁矿会被地球磁场吸引。

en: The lines of this field run between magnetic north and magnetic south at the two poles.
zh: 磁场线连接着南北两极。

en: This remedy will do you good overnight.
zh: 这个药你吃一晚就能见效。

en: Next time I come, I'll bring you some flowers.
zh: 下次我来的时候给你带些花。

en: I will win the game next time.
zh: 下次比赛我一定会赢。

en: You will be able to sing better next time.
zh: 下次你肯定能唱得更好。

en: I will come earlier next time.
zh: 下次我会早点儿来。

en: When can I see you next time?
zh: 下次什么时候能见到你？

en: I will see you on next Tuesday, that is to say, the 10th of September.
zh: 我们下周二见，也就是九月十号。

en: Please tell me about your town in your next letter.
zh: 下次写信告诉我一些你们镇上的事吧。

en: Please bring me the book next time you come.
zh: 下次来的时候请把那本书带给我。

en: I will tell him about it when he comes next time.
zh: 下次他来的时候，我会告诉他这件事。

en: I will make up for it next time.
zh: 我下次会补上的。

en: Ask him when to get together next.
zh: 问问他下次什么时候聚聚。

en: Look me up next time you are in Kyoto.
zh: 下次你来京都的时候记得找我。

en: I wanted this watch so badly I could taste it.
zh: 我特别想要这块表，想得心痒痒。

en: The quality of craftsmanship in this clock company is unsurpassed.
zh: 这家钟表公司的工艺是无可比拟的。

en: I would buy this watch, except it's too expensive.
zh: 要不是因为太贵，我就买这块表了。

en: I would like to exchange this watch with a cheaper one.
zh: 我想把这块表换成个便宜点儿的。

en: You can have this watch for nothing.
zh: 这块表白送你了。

en: This watch is a real bargain.
zh: 这块表买得真划算。

en: This watch is waterproof.
zh: 这表防水。

en: This watch is my father's.
zh: 这块表是我爸的。

en: This watch keeps bad time.
zh: 这块表走得不准。

en: This watch is of great value.
zh: 这块表挺值钱的。

en: This watch is made in Japan.
zh: 这表是日本产的。

en: The clock does not run.
zh: 这钟不走了。

en: This clock isn't working.
zh: 这钟坏了。

en: This clock is electric.
zh: 这是个电钟。

en: What is the price of this watch?
zh: 这块表多少钱？

en: I guarantee this watch to keep perfect time.
zh: 我保证这表走得特别准。

en: This clock is accurate.
zh: 这钟挺准的。

en: This watch needs repairing. It gains 20 minutes a day.
zh: 这表得修了，一天快二十分钟。

en: This watch wants mending.
zh: 这表得修一下。

en: The watch keeps accurate time.
zh: 这块表走得挺准。

en: This watch is not mine but yours.
zh: 这表不是我的，是你的。

en: This watch is expensive.
zh: 这块表挺贵的。

en: This watch is similar to mine I lost yesterday.
zh: 这表跟我昨天丢的那块挺像的。

en: This clock seems to be malfunctioning.
zh: 这钟好像出故障了。

en: This clock is out of order.
zh: 这钟坏了。

en: This watch is shock-proof.
zh: 这表防震。

en: This watch is broken.
zh: 这表坏了。

en: This watch cost me ten thousand yen.
zh: 这块表花了我一万日元。

en: This clock gains two minutes a day.
zh: 这钟一天快两分钟。

en: This clock loses three minutes a day.
zh: 这钟一天慢三分钟。

en: This clock gains one minute a day.
zh: 这钟一天快一分钟。

en: Something seems to be wrong with this watch.
zh: 这表好像出什么毛病了。

en: Something has happened to this clock.
zh: 这钟出毛病了。

en: This watch costs ten dollars at the most.
zh: 这表顶多也就值十块钱。

en: This watch was given me by my uncle.
zh: 这表是我叔叔送我的。

en: This watch is far better than that one.
zh: 这块表比那块好多了。

en: This clock is far more expensive than that.
zh: 这钟比那个贵多了。

en: This watch is superior to that one.
zh: 这块表比那块强多了。

en: This watch is less expensive than that one.
zh: 这块表比那块便宜。

en: This watch is twice as expensive as that one.
zh: 这块表比那块贵一倍。

en: This watch is as expensive a gift as that bracelet.
zh: 这表跟那条手链一样，都是挺贵的礼物。

en: This watch is meant for you.
zh: 这表是送给你的。

en: This clock strikes the quarter hour.
zh: 这钟每刻钟报一次时。

en: This watch is ten minutes slow.
zh: 这表慢了十分钟。

en: This watch is ten minutes fast.
zh: 这表快了十分钟。

en: They guarantee this clock for a year.
zh: 这钟保修一年。

en: This watch keeps correct time.
zh: 这表走得挺准。

en: Snowing at this time of the year is unusual.
zh: 每年这个时候下雪挺少见的。

en: There's a lot of traffic on the roads around this time of the day.
zh: 每天这时候路上车都挺多的。

en: The roads are very crowded at this time of the day.
zh: 每天这时候路上都特别堵。

en: It's odd that there should be a light on in the office at this hour.
zh: 这时候办公室还亮着灯，真奇怪。

en: This is the time he normally arrives.
zh: 他平时这时候该到了。

en: This temple dates from the 7th century.
zh: 这座庙是七世纪建的。

en: This temple dates back to 780.
zh: 这座庙可以追溯到公元780年。
